casebody.data:
CITY OF NEW YORK v. SHORTLAND BROS. CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 4, 1904.) No. 171. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. E. Crosby Kindleberger, for appellant. James Forrester, for appellees.

Before WALLACE, LACOMBE, and TOWNSEND, Circuit Judges.

No opinion. Decree (129 Fed. 973) affirmed, with costs.
